mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cultural (title, lecture_start, lecture_end, registration_start, registration_end, target, lecture_time, lecture_place, lecture_day, lecture_name, cost, lecture_text, image_path, write_date) VALUES (#{title}, #{lectureStart}, #{lectureEnd}, #{registrationStart}, #{registrationEnd}, #{target}, #{lectureTime} , #{lecturePlace} , #{lectureDay} , #{lectureName} , #{cost} , #{lectureText}, #{imagePath}, #{writeDate})
mapper.select: SELECT cul_id, title, lecture_start, lecture_end, registration_start, registration_end, target, image_path, count FROM ( SELECT CCC.*, ROWNUM as rn FROM ( SELECT cul_id, title, lecture_start, lecture_end, registration_start, registration_end, target, image_path, count FROM cultural WHERE registration_end >= CURRENT_DATE ORDER BY cul_id DESC ) CCC ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}

SELECT image_path, title, lecture_start, lecture_end, registration_start, registration_end, target, lecture_time, lecture_place, lecture_day, lecture_name, cost, lecture_text, image_path, write_date FROM cultural WHERE cul_id = #{culId}
